resources.string:
Hi, This is e-night App. 

 Course Part. 

 This part help student to manager their courses during an school year. 
 Your can add all courses you got for the year and your can have a look of all of them 
 When you click on one of them your can see the details like how many ETCS is it and if you already success that course


 Profile part. 

 In this part you can manage all users of the app on your gsm. 
 You can also set any profile by adding or change a first name and last name of an user 
and you can have a look of all users which has already used you app.


Food Truck Part. 

 If your are in brussels town and looking for something to eat 
 you can use this part of app that has a list of all food truck in brussels 
 but unfortunately is not finish. 
 hopefully, i will be focus on this part after i passed all my exam. 

 

Hope this app will be helpful to you, Thank u
